snippet: The leader of a military junta in Mali denied that its coup had provided an opening for a rapid separatist takeover of a large section of the country's rebellious north.
abstract: The leader of a military junta in Mali denied that its coup had provided an opening for a rapid separatist takeover of a large section of the country's rebellious north.

headline.main: Junta Leader in Mali Tries to Shift Focus From Coup
